Index.slogan: BESIDES CUSTOM MANUFACTURING, WE WILL PROVIDE CLIENTS WITH PROPER ENGINEERING SUGGESTIONS DURING THE PROCESS. WE TRY TO EARN THE MAXIMUM BENEFIT FOR CLIENTS.

About.headerTitle: NOT ONLY WE MAKE, WE ENGINEERING
About.industrialExperienceDescription: Most of requirements are customized. By our 20-year experience, stable and high quality products can be delivered.
About.oneStopServiceDescription: With satellite supplier chain, we are able to provide clients with one-stop manufacturing service even if we don't own all production line. This is also the key point for us to shorten lead time.

AdFixtures.title: WHERE WE CRAFT LIMITLESS POSSIBILITIES JUST FOR YOU
AdFixtures.description: At AD Fixtures, we turn your vision into reality with our state-of-the-art manufacturing capabilities and innovative design solutions.

Capability.description_metal: Within Our State-Of-The-Art Metal Factory, We Breathe Life Into Raw Materials, Sculpting Them Into Bespoke Masterpieces
Capability.imageAlt_metal: Modern living room with metal furniture
Capability.description_millwork: Our Advanced Millwork Facility Transforms Raw Wood into Exquisite, Custom-Crafted Pieces
Capability.description_powder: In Our Cutting-Edge Powder Coating Facility, We Apply Durable and Vibrant Finishes to Metal Surfaces

WeAreCapable.title: WE ARE CAPABLE
WeAreCapable.versatileSolutionDescription: Beyond metal and wood, our capabilities extend to sourcing a myriad of materials, offering you a palette of options.
WeAreCapable.valueEngineeringDescription: Through value engineering, we transform ideas into reality. High quality and fair price are delivered to clients.

ProcessHub.title: OUR FACTORY IS NOT JUST A PRODUCTION FACILITY, BUT A HUB OF CREATIVITY AND CRAFTSMANSHIP
ProcessHub.description: HERE'S A GLIMPSE INTO HOW WE, AS A TEAM, BRING YOUR CONCEPTS TO LIFE

Process.title: Witness Your Idea
Process.description: Based on your vision, our skilled team turns it into a tangible prototype.

step1.title: MEET YOUR NEEDS
step1.description:
Let's start by understanding your needs:
1.Specifications
2.Construction details
3.Preferred material and finish
4.Project budget
Your vision is our priority, and we're here to tailor a solution that ticks all your boxes.

step2.title: VALUE ENGINEERING LEADS TO SOLUTION
step2.description:
We are not only making goods.
Through our meticulous value engineering processes, we transform your ideas into reality, seamlessly merging innovation and cost-effectiveness.

step3.title: PRECISION IN PRODUCTION
step3.description:
Top-notch quality and accurate lead-time are delivered to clients.
Before anything leaves our facility, it undergoes a thorough quality check to ensure it exceeds your expectations.

step4.title: PARTNERSHIP BEYOND PRODUCTS
step4.description: Aiming to build lasting partnerships with clients, we're not just here to sell; we're here to support your success.

WorksPortfolio.skechersDescription: Providing Skechers with manufacturing service for 10 years, we developed custom RC shoes for Skechers.
WorksPortfolio.ispoDescription: This tool-free assembly solution allows for swift and efficient construction of fixtures, facilitating a quick and effective setup for your store.
WorksPortfolio.hokaDescription: Vividly colored fixtures infuse the store with a vibrant and energetic atmosphere, while the easily movable display shelves offer versatile presentation options for showcasing products in a variety of ways.
WorksPortfolio.bvlgariDescription: To cooperate with GJ Decoration, we have chance to do re-construction for outside wall of Taiwan BVLGARI store.
WorksPortfolio.bmaDescription: To support BMA group in manufacturing fixtures for 3 brands, we opened 150 stores for client in UAE area.
WorksPortfolio.aldoDescription: Cooperating with ALDO for 3 generation of store fixtures, we are honored to participate in those achievement.

CallToActions.title: FIND OUT HOW WE CAN CREATE ENDLESS POSSIBILITIES TOGETHER

Footer.address: No.68, Jiangong Street, Taiping District Taichung City 411034, Taiwan
